trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The careworn cleaner appears to be in a spot of bother.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_TODO_00<tab>Collect the True Vue refuse sacks.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the careworn cleaner.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_TODO_02<tab>Express your /doubt to the leering delinquent.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_TODO_03<tab>Hand over the True Vue refuse sacks to the careworn cleaner.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_000<tab>Oh, come to check up on me, have you? I appreciate your concern. As you can probably tell, I'm feeling a little out of sorts.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_A1_000_001<tab>Shall I fetch a healer for you?
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_A1_000_002<tab>Do you need me to escort you somewhere?
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_A1_000_003<tab>Perhaps I could treat you?

TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_001<tab>Oh no, there's no need for that. I have a condition, you see─it makes me numb and lethargic from time to time. Nothing a little rest won't put right, though.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_002<tab>The trouble is, when I get like this, I'm in no state to work. I hate to presume, but would you be willing to lend a hand?

TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_003<tab>I'm one of the cleaners in charge of True Vue. I was then getting ready to collect the last of the refuse sacks and call it a day when my condition flared up... I'd be ever so grateful if you could finish my rounds for me.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_005<tab>Please, it's only a few refuse sacks. You'd be doing me a real kindness. I can barely feel my arms and legs...
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_HYUNE05165_000_010<tab>Ohoho! You look damn near death! What's the matter!?
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_ELDITE05165_000_011<tab>Huh? Whatever's ailin' ye got to your tongue has it!?
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_020<tab>A-Ah, there you are... I, err...these fellows have─

TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_HYUNE05165_000_021<tab>Our ol' pal here's feeling under the weather─can't finish his work. So he offers to pay us─generously, I might add─to get the job done! In other words, ain't got no need for the likes o' you. Go on, piss off!

TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>This is clearly nothing more than a brazen attempt at extortion. Turn the full force of your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on the leering delinquent.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_025<tab>Of all the days they could have picked...
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_ELDITE05165_000_026<tab>Listen, we've got our ol' pal here covered! Do yerself a favor and walk away before this gets ugly.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_HYUNE05165_000_030<tab>Lemme get this straight, <var 1A 02 /var>you're<var 1A 01 /var> the one our ol' pal here asked to help? Hah! What a load o' shite!

TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_ELDITE05165_000_031<tab>H-Hold on a moment. This <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((feller)) /var> looks like <var 08 E905 ((she's)) ((he's)) /var> seen a fair few scrapes... Wait, don't tell me they're a bloody hunter!
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_HYUNE05165_000_032<tab>A hunter? Sod this for a lark! I'd rather keep me head!

TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_HYUNE05165_000_035<tab>Look, I just told you. <var 1A 02 /var>We're<var 1A 01 /var> dealin' with this feller's problems. If you know what's good for you, you'll turn around and keep walkin'.

TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>This is clearly nothing more than a brazen attempt at extortion. Turn the full force of your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on the leering delinquent.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_040<tab>Phew... I dread to think what would've happened if you hadn't showed up. Ah, am I right to assume you've finished collecting the refuse sacks for me?

TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_041<tab>Excellent, I'll take care of these. I must say─refuse collection, civic protection...you're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of many talents. You have my gratitude.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_042<tab>This sector isn't exactly the safest in the city... Shakedowns and racketeering are unfortunately rather commonplace.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_043<tab>Usually, I try to leave as soon as I finish my rounds, but today my luck ran out and I had one of my turns.

TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_044<tab>This condition─it's caused by sensitivity to lightning energy. I hear the worst affected are all but bedbound by paralysis, so perhaps I should count myself lucky that my symptoms are relatively mild.
TEXT_KINGZG002_05165_CLEANER05165_000_045<tab>But enough about that. Thanks to you, I feel more or less back to my usual self. To think that I'd run into someone as virtuous as you on True Vue.
